info.title: SOS Inventory
info.description: Retrieves and updates information in SOS Inventory

count.description: The number of results returned in this query.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Returns records that match the provided comma separated list of tags.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Returns records that match the provided item type.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of items returned. Default 10

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of locations returned. Default 10

get.description: Gets a Sales Order by ID

count.description: The number of Sales Orders Returned

totalCount.description: The number of Matching Sales Orders

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filters by whether transaction is open or closed.

put.description: Updates a specific pick ticket by setting the values of the parameters passed.

count.description: The number of Pick Tickets Returned

totalCount.description: The number of Matching Pick Tickets

parameters.name: maxresults
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: If present, returns only summary values.

weightunit.description: Sales Order Line Item Weight Unit

volumeunit.description: Sales Order Line Item Volume Unit

unitprice.description: Sales Order Line Item Unit Price

picked.description: Sales Order Line Item Quantity Picked

shipped.description: Sales Order Line Item Quantity Shipped

invoiced.description: Sales Order Line Item Quantity Invoiced

produced.description: Sales Order Line Item Quantity Produced

returned.description: Sales Order Line Item Quantity Returned

listPrice.description: Sales Order Line Item List Price

percentdiscount.description: Sales Order Line Item Percent Discount

duedate.description: Sales Order Line Item Due Date
